item.title: Facebook will use our data for training generative AI models
item.description: Looks like those copypasta stories about Facebook’s rights to your information were right all along.

item.title: Work I've been doing
item.description:
I’ve been very quiet, haven’t I?

Pictured: boxed Star Wars Despecialized DVDs I made for a friend; only Star Wars (IV: A New Hope) was ready for 4th May 2022
